html:
Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_9wywjsgr&referenceId=1_9wywjsgr&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Stocktube

Description: Poseidon Nickel Ltd (ASX:POS, OTC:PSDNF)'s Peter Harold says they've recorded a very wide intersection of 13.6 metres of massive sulphides within the Tundra Mute resource in the Silver Swan channel. He says it's the best intersection so far in the current drill program and is significant given that the average thickness of the Tundra Mute inferred resource was previously about 2 metres.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3xemdzz
